content.question: Which of the following is true of the energy of the system during this process?

choices.label: The total mechanical energy of the system is conserved.
The total mechanical energy of the system increases.
The energy lost to friction is equal to the gain in the potential energy of the spring.
The potential energy lost by block 2 is less in magnitude than the potential energy gained by the spring.
The potential energy lost by block 2 is greater in magnitude than the potential energy gained by the spring.

content.answer: The potential energy lost by block 2 is greater in magnitude than the potential energy gained by the spring.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
